rows.THE LAUNCH AS A CLUSTER: The 3-week sprint is a cluster production. The PM co-founder is the Cluster PM.
THE FRAME
In the Trade, a cluster is a group of related models that get produced together
by one person coordinating experts and using Claude.
The launch IS a cluster. Its workstreams are:
• Incorporation (I1-I10)
• Site build (product person delivers)
• Content production (actor delivers daily)
• Expert sessions (PM coordinates, Claude incorporates)
• Fundraising setup (CoS pipeline, investor materials, data room)
• Recruiting (VA sources, PM vets, Nilo approves)
The PM co-founder coordinates all of these simultaneously.
That's what a Cluster PM does. That's why the role exists.
The difference from a normal Cluster PM:
This one has co-founder equity because the launch cluster is the most important one.
Get this right, everything downstream works.
Get this wrong, there's nothing to produce.
LAUNCH CLUSTER WORKSTREAMS
Workstream
Incorporation
rows.col_4: Entity type decided. Formation filed. EIN applied.
rows.col_5: Op agreement + cap table done. Bank open. IP assigned.
rows.col_6: Data room ready. Compliance started. Investor-ready.

rows.THE LAUNCH AS A CLUSTER: Site Build
rows.col_4: Brand system. Password gate + hero live.
rows.col_5: Story + Cast + Daily Feed live. CMS working.
rows.col_6: Full site complete. Site 2 complete. QA done.

rows.THE LAUNCH AS A CLUSTER: Content Production
rows.col_4: Casting + test shoot. Day 1 video posted.

rows.THE LAUNCH AS A CLUSTER: Expert Sessions
rows.col_6: All 8 clusters reviewed. Trade at expert-grade.

rows.THE LAUNCH AS A CLUSTER: Fundraising Setup
rows.col_5: CoS signed. Investor intro list built.
rows.col_6: First investor meetings. Data room sent.

rows.THE LAUNCH AS A CLUSTER: Recruiting
rows.col_4: PM + Actor hired. Product person contracted.
rows.col_5: CoS pipeline active. Expert pipeline active.
rows.col_6: VP pipeline started. Operator pipeline opened.

rows.THE LAUNCH AS A CLUSTER: DAILY STANDUP (PM CO-FOUNDER RUNS THIS)
Every day, 15 minutes, all active people:
1. SITE STATUS — Is the site on track? What shipped? What's blocked?
2. CONTENT STATUS — Did the actor post today? Quality check.
3. INCORPORATION STATUS — What filed? What's pending? Any legal questions?
4. PIPELINE STATUS — Who's in the funnel for CoS, experts, VPs?
5. BLOCKERS — What needs Nilo? What needs money? What needs a decision?
This is the internal feedback loop. The site is the external one.
PM co-founder runs the standup. The actor records the public version.
Same information, two audiences.
